TopicTitle: Turret's Syndrome - three-pack of turrets for er turreting....

Articles.Content:
Because I've been avoiding space and tinkering with spinny things... I'll throw these three different bearings out there in the form of turrets. Pull it apart and build a better turret. Or add some BDArmory guns and destroy things with greater accuracy. Or not.

My personal favourite because she's so darn robust, the Hanging Turret. It's that good you can fit it to a cargo bay, use some fancy offsetting tricks and subject it to the wind. That's right, hang it under an aircraft and go whaling or er birdwatching.

In general you'll want to use SAS on the Small Turret and the Large Turret. The Large Turret is the worst bearing among them. But it's also quite heavy. However, everything will pitch up and down, and do the spinning spinney stuff. If using the command pods and ladders to load Kerbals, dont forget to retract the ladders before you stage!
